revised_title: Harold Brewer Hartley: A Pioneering Chemist and Educator
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life and work of Harold Brewer Hartley, a prominent chemist and educator. Hartley made significant contributions to the fields of electrochemistry, non-aqueous solutions, and the solvation of ions. His passion for chemistry education and history led him to become an influential figure in the academic world, shaping the lives of many students and colleagues throughout his career.
